channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Mickey Huang Scandal Exposes Global Challenge of Online Child Sexual Abuse
item.description: The recent local scandal involving TV host Mickey Huang has exposed the global nature of child sexual abuse online.

item.title: Mother Alleges Nanny Hospitalized Child in Another Child Abuse Case in Taiwan
item.description: A mother has alleged that her nanny abused and seriously injured her five-month-old baby in what has become a string of child abuse scandals in Taiwan in recent months.

item.title: Tsai and Visiting New Zealand Parliamentarians Seek To Deepen Ties
item.description: President Tsai Ing-wen has met with a delegation of New Zealand parliamentarians in Taipei. Both countries have vowed to strenghten cooperation on Indigenous culture, renewable ene

item.title: Xiaoliuqiu Island To Start Charging Conservation Fee to Tourists
item.description: Southern Taiwan's Xiaoliuqiu Island will start charging visitors a conservation fee for entering protected coastal zones. The island's beaches, corals reefs and wildlife attract hu
